description: Stylish, warm and weatherproof, the Camosun Parka delivers truly waterproof, windproof and breathable protection on the harshest days. The Camosun uses a Gore-Tex 2-layer face fabric with a soft hand, supple feel and longwearing performance. Down Contour Construction™ allows the down to form to the body, enhancing thermal performance with a trimmer, more streamlined fit. Down Composite Mapping™ effectively places down and synthetic insulations where they deliver the most benefit. Lofty 750 fill power European goose down lines the core and sleeves where loft is most needed. Coreloft™ synthetic insulation is used at the cuffs, hood and under the arms, areas prone to contact with moisture. The removable hood utilizes Coreloft™ synthetic insulation for added protection and warmth
name: Arcteryx Camosun Parka - Mens
